# Tic Tac Toe
This example shows how to create an app where the user can play [Tic Tac Toe](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tic-tac-toe) against another human (on the same device).

::bagawork-project[show&editor&code&url=http://localhost:8080/editor/#]
